member.name: T:Galatea.AI.Characterization.UserFeedback
member.summary: Represents a pattern specifying that a user response is positive/negative, and to what degree.
member.remarks: UserFeedback inherits from the Template model, as it should factor in the Artificial Intelligence system.

member.summary: Gets an integer specifying the degree by which the feedback is Positive or Negative.

member.summary: A instance that is neither Positive nor Negative.

member.summary: A instance that is unenthusiastically positive.

member.summary: A very positive instance.

member.name: P:Galatea.AI.Characterization.UserFeedbackTemplates.Great
member.summary: A highly positive instance.

member.summary: A instance that is apathetically negative.

member.name: P:Galatea.AI.Characterization.UserFeedbackTemplates.No
member.summary: A moderately negative instance.

member.name: P:Galatea.AI.Characterization.UserFeedbackTemplates.Bad
member.summary: A very negative instance.

member.name: P:Galatea.AI.Characterization.UserFeedbackTemplates.Awful
member.summary: A highly negative instance.

member.summary: Creates a new instance from a .

The component that created and labeled the .

member.name: M:Galatea.AI.Abstract.SymbolTemplateCollection.Identify(Galatea.AI.Abstract.SymbolTemplate,System.Int16@)
member.summary: Identifies the which most closely resembles the specified pattern.
member.param: A instance for comparison.
The degree of certainty from 0 to 100 with which a Template is identified.
member.returns: The which most closely resembles the unknown item.
member.remarks:
Determine if the Bitmap resembles an Alpha-Numeric pattern by reducing the image to a 5x5 grid. Then compare each square to a database of 5x5 bitmaps for each Alpha-Numeric character. Each 5x5 square is one point -- up to 25 points total. The bitmap must score at least 18.
If you have a better algorithm, you would modify this method or override, if you are inheriting.
